IntroText: Hello there, you must be COMMON_PLAYERNAME?|I'm Lauren.
Hello there.|Looks like someone is a little tied up at the moment.
I see you prefer to stay tied up.
Hello there, you look good in those hand cuffs.
I see you prefer to be gagged.
Hello again.
I'm teaching Nicole how to escape handcuffs without|the key.  Would you like to learn too?
The group next to us is discussing rope|techniques if you interested in that.
Would you like to learn how to escape from handcuffs?
Found that key yet?
The handcuff mechanism is really very crude.
You remember what I was saying about hand cuff mechanisms?
I was just saying I slide a strip|of metal between the pawl and ratchet
Do you want to learn the technique now?
When you are ready, handcuff yourself and|I will talk you through escaping them.
I'll only explain how if you are willing to|have a go and cuff yourself first.
Excellent, you're ready to start.
Image? - Broken hair clip in players hands?
Hi there, could you give us a moment.|Nicole is struggling and needs my help.
You remove you blindfold to see who you caught.
(Lauren is still struggling to escape.)
(Lauren is cuffed to the chair, unable to escape.)
(Lauren is cuffed to the chair, unable to escape.)
(Lauren is rather busy teaching Nicole.)
(Your arms are lifted up high behind you|and the handcuffs attached to something.)
